.. _`Resources`:

Resources
=========
This section describes class and functions private to <application-name>. It is intended to document how the application works

labs.lab-1
----------
creating a pull request 

labs.lab-2
----------
working with Pip & Virtual Environments

labs.lab-3
----------
Creating & Connecting to a Postgres DB

labs.lab-4
----------
Writing SQL Queries

labs.lab-5
----------
Building an Intentionally Bad GUI

labs.lab-6
----------
working with forms and Create a login form that requires a user's email and password.

labs.lab-7
----------
Input validation, sanitization, error handling, & logging

labs.lab-8
----------
working with Javascript

labs.lab-9
----------
Unit Tests

labs.lab-10
-----------
using sphinx
